thread.title: Romain G.
thread.title_full: www.lanieri.com recensione scritta da Romain G.

author: Romain G.
title: Romain G.
text:
Use the code MOXFUFU for 100 euro discount !!
I just received my 4th shirt, the fit is still perfect, the delivery on time and the overall quality (King Oxford White - Ibieffe) is spectacular.
Please consider that the fit will almost needs adjustments if this is your first time with MTM !
Use the code MOXFUFU for 100 euro discount !!
